com.labyrinth.ui.interfaces

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinth.ui.Window
      • com.labyrinth.ui.interfaces.UserInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadUI, MainMenuUI, OptionsUI

    public abstract class UserInterface
extends Window
    Represents the outline of a text-based UI for a general purpose. It provides functionality for prompting the user for input via the standard input stream. This input is then returned in a 'tokenized' form. For example: input: "hello world" -> output: ["hello", "world"] It also provides basic functionality for parsing the input.
    Version:
    0.1.19042013
    Author:
    Gareth Gill, John Meikle
